summary: just rewatched the gameplay demo. right after the scene where V wakes up with the random dude, in the quick shot of her ordering...
question: just rewatched the gameplay demo. right after the scene where V wakes up with the random dude, in the quick shot of her ordering a drink, on the machine it lists 'joygirls' and 'joyboys' as things you can order. which makes my mind wander into dirty places. and maybe that dude was a joyboy?
answer:
Yes! I think you could be right! Especially because the list also says ‘meals’ which confirms you can get more than just drinks from the vending machine. Why not a ‘joyboy’ or a ‘joygirl’?

Also, the drinks on the left are 15/12E$ and her order is 530E$?! So maybe her ‘joyboy’ cost 500E$? And she had a drink from last night that she picks up before getting up, then buys another one once she up? It all makes sense to me.

Good observation anon!

reblog.comment:

Also, the drinks on the left are 15/12E$ and her order is 530E$?! So maybe her ‘joyboy’ cost 500E$? And she had a drink from last night that she picks up before getting up, then buys another one once she up? It all makes sense to me.

Good observation anon!

trail.content_raw:
Yes! I think you could be right! Especially because the list also says ‘meals’ which confirms you can get more than just drinks from the vending machine. Why not a ‘joyboy’ or a ‘joygirl’?

Also, the drinks on the left are 15/12E$ and her order is 530E$?! So maybe her ‘joyboy’ cost 500E$? And she had a drink from last night that she picks up before getting up, then buys another one once she up? It all makes sense to me.

Good observation anon!
trail.content:
Yes! I think you could be right! Especially because the list also says ‘meals’ which confirms you can get more than just drinks from the vending machine. Why not a ‘joyboy’ or a ‘joygirl’?

Also, the drinks on the left are 15/12E$ and her order is 530E$?! So maybe her ‘joyboy’ cost 500E$? And she had a drink from last night that she picks up before getting up, then buys another one once she up? It all makes sense to me.

Good observation anon!

summary: В Cyberpunk 2077 нет процедурно сгенерированных элементов мира
title: В Cyberpunk 2077 нет процедурно сгенерированных элементов мира
body: Ведущий аниматор кинематографических сцен ролевого шутера Cyberpunk 2077 Мацей Петрас (Maceij Pietras) рассказал порталу JeuxActu о том, что вся игра создаётся вручную. Ни один из элементов не будет процедурно сгенерирован. Продолжая тему вертикально… Читать дальше »

summary: it is ready! my concept for V - cdpr pls let us have long high ponytails in the cc 🙏 i had this idea that my character will be...
caption:
it is ready! my concept for V - cdpr pls let us have long high ponytails in the cc 🙏

i had this idea that my character will be very subtle with her cybernetics and overall style, so most her cybernetics can be covered with clothing, and the clothes being very generic for cyberpunk universe~

summary:
Why Cyberpunk 2077 Could Be a Game-Changer 

There’s no guarantee that CD Projekt Red will be able to do it of course, but they...
caption:
Why Cyberpunk 2077 Could Be a Game-Changer

There’s no guarantee that CD Projekt Red will be able to do it of course, but they at least have all the necessary pieces. If this game releases and succeeds, it’s likely to change the RPG landscape. 

Read more!

https://www.hardcoregamer.com/2019/01/14/why-cyberpunk-2077-could-be-a-game-changer/322155/

tags: but im still not gon like it
summary: managing to keep the hype train fuelled on a drip feed whilst maintaining a lot of guardedness on release dates and broad...
body: managing to keep the hype train fuelled on a drip feed whilst maintaining a lot of guardedness on release dates and broad details leads me to believe that cyberpunk stands a good chance of meeting its hype. im judging purely on game industry dunning kruger. the more reserved, perhaps the better. and judging by the amount of investment they have that they could be putting to marketing. these are positive signs at the very least

reblog.comment: managing to keep the hype train fuelled on a drip feed whilst maintaining a lot of guardedness on release dates and broad details leads me to believe that cyberpunk stands a good chance of meeting its hype. im judging purely on game industry dunning kruger. the more reserved, perhaps the better. and judging by the amount of investment they have that they could be putting to marketing. these are positive signs at the very least

summary: O Twitter de Cyberpunk 2077 está batendo um papo com os fãs de um jeito bem brasileiro
title: O Twitter de Cyberpunk 2077 está batendo um papo com os fãs de um jeito bem brasileiro
body:
Há exatamente um ano o Twitter de Cyberpunk 2077 virava pauta na mídia de games por ter publicado apenas uma palavra. Na época, o perfil não costumava ser muito ativo nas redes sociais, mas isso mudou. Na quarta-feira, 9, a equipe da CD Projekt Red não apenas publicou imagens de um cosplay inspirado do game, como também bateu um papo com os fãs brasileiros por meio da rede social.

Além de…

View On WordPress
